CGPX
February IS, 1952
Hr. C. C. Delong, Bursar
109b Administration
Dear Cliff:
Pursuant to our telephone conversation today, I understand that you
will write the Kellogg Foundation requesting that our grant year be changed to
July 1-June 30 and stating that there are sufficient funds in this year* s budget
to carry us to June 30, 19<>2.
I also understand that you will write to Kellogg inquiring as to the
type of financial report they expect and that you will prepare any such financial
report for them.
Jim Hlles
Executive Director
JSMiWC
cc: Seymour N. Siegel
Frank Schooley .â€”
Wilbur Schramm
